title: martellcoin
author: martellcoin
content: Martell Coin - The Futuristic Global Finance Solution   Official Website||Whitepaper||ExplorerMartellCoin is creating an ecosystem with $MTC, Martell algorithm and a robust Marketplace. It is aimed at providing the best user-experience of digital currency to everyone.Problems we are trying to solve:❇️ Blockchain is not really easy to understand❇️ Dependence on middleman❇️ Slower Transaction speed❇️ Transaction Cost❇️ Huge hidden fee❇️ Risk of loseSolutionsMartell is a cutting-edge cryptocurrency initiative that aims to give everyone access to a better future in the world of digital cryptocurrency. It focuses on developing decentralized applications (dapps), which will increase transaction speed, increase security, and do away with middlemen from the system.What it offers$MTC token is a BEP-20 token with Martell’s integrated burning mechanism at one side will keep the transaction cost to minimum and also provide better and faster transactions without any boundary at the other side will gain value with time and increasing use. With the Martell algorithm and Martell Marketplace, the platform is providing an ecosystem where users and investors can use, trade, transact, and earn profit without any risk and intermediaries.Advancements with Martell:✅ Trading without Loss✅ Martell algorithm✅ Faster transaction speed✅ Profit Booster✅ Robust burning mechanism✅ Next-gen smart treasury✅ A reliable BEP-20 coin — Martell coin$MTC ProtocolSpeedThe transaction time is just one second. The system can manage 10,000 transactions per second.Anonymous BalanceOne of the best features of the algorithm is that it does not display the user’s wallet balance to the network.CostMartell can be transferred from one wallet to another without any transaction cost for the transaction.MTC Token WalletA binance chain Martell Wallet where you can store your crypto assets (BEP20).ApplicationMartell coin is a requirement for every business, and thus it has applications across various platforms. This provides peace of mind for the buyer as they know the value of the transaction there will be no change in the price in the coming days.✅ Official website:: https://www.martellcoin.io/Follow Us on Social MediaFacebook—Twitter—Telegram—Medium—Linkedin—Reddit—Youtube

comments.body: Quote from: elmo40 on February 06, 2023, 08:24:09 PMpointless talking to idiots like this.token != coingo away. no one wants this nonsense token anyways. gas fees are stupid.Difference between Coin and TokenCoin has its own blockchain.Token built on an existing blockchain.We never said Martell Coin is a coin, it is just a name. Martell Coin (MTC) is a Binance Chain utility token synchronized with crypto points with the goal of making cryptocurrency more accessible to the average person by being easy to use.
